virtual uint8_t cvq::dom_ip_add (  const std::string &  ,
const std::string & 
)  [pure virtual, inherited]
 

Add domain's alias address (for example ip address). Ip addresses should be in form [a.b.c.d], or a.b.c.d ( it's better to add 2 forms).

Implemented in cfsvq.

uint8_t cfsvq::dom_rm (  const std::string &  d  )  [virtual, inherited]
 

Remove domain. It removes domain from qmail control file, authorization then from filesystem. It ignores errors (so it may not remove something).

Returns:
last error code returned by any called function. So only err_no means that everything was removed.

Implements cvq.

Definition at line 83 of file cfsvq_dom.cc.
